member.summary:
Make a variable declaration for a PropertyInfo initialized with a GetProperty call on a target's type.

member.summary:
Make a variable declaration for an object initialized via a call to PropertyInfo.GetValue via a given instance
Creates code similar to: object name = propertyInfo.GetValue(instance, null|new object[] {parameters});

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.DirectiveProcessor
member.summary: Base class for a concrete DirectiveProcessor
member.remarks: A singleton instance of any of these classes that is required will be held by the Engine. This class implements a state machine with the Get... methods only valid after a Start...Finish pair.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IRecognizeHostSpecific
member.summary:
(Optional) interface that DirectiveProcessors can implement if they care about the value of the HostSpecific flag when they are generating code.
Will be called immediately after Initialize

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IRecognizeHostSpecific.SetProcessingRunIsHostSpecific(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inform the directive processor whether the run is host-specific.
member.remarks: Will be called after RequiresProcessingRunIsHostSpecific has been run on all directive processors to inform the processor what the final host-specifc decision is

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.IRecognizeHostSpecific.RequiresProcessingRunIsHostSpecific
member.summary: Allow a directive processor to specify that it needs the run to be host-specific.
member.remarks: If any directive processor in the run sets this to be true then the engine will make the entire run host-specific.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Engine.AddInitializeMethod(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Add an override to the Initialize method to contribute preInit or postInit code

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Engine.ProvideBaseClassOverrideAttribute(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession)
member.summary: Provide an attribute specifying whether optional methods from the base class should be overridden or virtual

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Engine.ProcessCustomDirectives(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Interfaces.ITextTemplatingEngineHost,Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession,System.Collections.Generic.List{Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Directive})
member.summary: Process all directives handled by either extension directive processors or non built-in directives that ship with the engine.
member.remarks: The difference between built-in directives and custom but shipped directives is that true built-in directives are allowed to mess with the processing logic. Custom shipped directives have the same restrictions as end-user extension directives. This is subtle but helps with keeping testing down as we know when they fire in the cycle. The difference should not be apparent to end users however.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Engine.GetLocalCustomDirectiveProcessor(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Directive)
member.summary: Get the type for any directive that is implemented in this assembly.
member.remarks: Patch the directive object to have an approprate processor name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.InvalidDebugParam
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An invalid debug value '{0}' was specified in the template directive. The debug value must be either "true" or "false". The default of "false" will be used..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.InvalidDirectiveArgumentFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Directive arguments should be of form 'name=value': {0}..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.InvalidHostSpecificParam
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An invalid HostSpecific value '{0}' was specified in the template directive. The HostSpecific value must be either "true" or "false". The default of "false" will be used..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.InvalidLanguage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An invalid language '{0}' was specified in the 'template' directive. The language must be either "C#" or "VB". The default value of "C#" will be used..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.InvalidNeutralCulture
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A neutral culture was specified in the 'template' directive. A specific culture must be provided. The invariant culture will be used..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.MultipleOutputDirectives
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Multiple output directives were found in the template. All but the first one will be ignored..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.MultipleTemplateDirectives
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Multiple template directives were found in the template. All but the first one will be ignored. Multiple parameters to the template directive should be specified within one template directive..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.NoAppDomain
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was a problem getting an AppDomain to run the transformation from the host. The process cannot continue. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.NoProcessorForDirective
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No processor was specified for a directive named '{0}'. The transformation will not be run..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.NoProcessorTypeForDirective
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A processor named '{0}' could not be found for the directive named '{1}'. The transformation will not be run. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.NotEnoughDirectiveParameters
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A required parameter '{0}' for the directive '{1}' was not found. The directive will be ignored. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.ParameterDirectiveTypeMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type '{1}' of the parameter '{0}' did not match the type of the data passed to the template..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.ProcessDirectiveCallError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ProcessDirective() was called before StartProcessingRun(). Directive processing can only start after StartProcessingRun() is called. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.ProcessorNotSupportDirective
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The processor named '{0}' does not support the directive named '{1}'. The transformation will not be run..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.RecursiveInclude
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The include directive for file '{0}' causes an infinite loop. The directive will not be processed..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.SessionHostMarshalError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Marshaling Session or Host object to secondary AppDomain failed. Check that Host and all types in Session dictionary are Serializable or derive from MarshalByReferenceObject..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.SetOutputEncodingFailed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The host threw an exception from SetOutputEncoding()..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.StartProcessingCallError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to StartProcessingRun() was called after directive processing was already started..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.TransformationErrorPrepend
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Running transformation: .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.UnexpectedTag
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An unexpected start or end tag was found within a block. Make sure that you did not mis-type a start or end tag, and that you do not have any nested blocks in the template..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.UnsupportedArgumentValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Attempt to specify unsupported {1} value '{0}' for directive {2}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.WrongBlockSequence
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A {0} cannot appear after the first class feature in the template. Only boilerplate, expressions and other class features are allowed after the first class feature block..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.WrongDirectiveFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A directive was specified in the wrong format. The transformation will not be run. Please specify the directive in the format <#@ name [parameterName="parameterValue"]* #>.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.Properties.Resources.WrongFinalBlockType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A template containing a class feature must end with a class feature..

member.summary: Provide a token to uniquely identify this instance of a directive processor
member.remarks: By default, allow an ID parameter to be used on the directive. Frequently, directive processors would choose to use one of their Provides parameters
member.returns: A unique id for this directive instance

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.RequiresProvidesDirectiveProcessor.PostProcessArguments(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Method for derived classes to make any modifications to the dictionaries that they require
Method for derived classes to generate the code they wish to add to the TextTransformation generated class.
Method for derived classes to contribute additively to initialization code for the TextTransformation generated class.
member.remarks: Additive code is useful where there are multiple directive processor instances each needing to have some instance-specific initialization. As GenerateTransformCode can add methods, matching initialization code is often required to call those methods. This code will be added before the call to the base class.

member.summary: Method for derived classes to contribute additively to initialization code for the TextTransformation generated class.
member.remarks: Additive code is useful where there are multiple directive processor instances each needing to have some instance-specific initialization. As GenerateTransformCode can add methods, matching initialization code is often required to call those methods. This code will be added after the call to the base class.

member.summary: Method for derived classes to specify the requires arguments they need for each directive by putting "" in the matching dictionary slot.

member.summary: Method for derived classes to specify the provides parameters they will supply for each directive by putting the default name in the matching dictionary slot.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession
member.summary: Class to carry the data associated with generation from one templated file
member.remarks: Note - this is not the same as the ITextTransformationSession which represents an end user's batched session of multiple transforms. The lifetime of this class is one call to ProcessTemplate or PreprocessTemplate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.Preprocess
member.summary: Whether this session is for precompilation or regular transformation

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.AssemblyDirectives
member.summary: List of full names of assemblies that need to be referenced when compiling/running the transformation code

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.ImportDirectives
member.summary: List of namespaces to be imported in the transformation code

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.ClassFullName
member.summary: The full name of the class that will be created to do the generation

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.BaseClassName
member.summary: The base class for the generated transformation class

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.Language
member.summary: The language that the template is written in. Defaults to CSharp

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.LanguageOptions
member.summary: Options set for the language of the template.
member.remarks: These options are passed directly to the CodeDOM provider

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.CodeDomProvider
member.summary: The CodeDomProvider used to build up the CodeDom tree of the code for the transformation class. This is constructed based on the Language property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.Debug
member.summary: Whether the transformation code is compiled in debug-mode.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TextTemplating.TemplateProcessingSession.HostSpecific
member.summary: Whether the template is host-specific or not. If it is host-specific, then a 'Host' property will be generated in the transformation code.

member.summary: Whether or not we have already processed an output directive for this template file

member.summary: Whether or not we have already processed a template directive for this template file

member.summary: The stack of files included

member.summary: The contents of the template being processed

member.remarks: May be null for non file-based hosts.
